ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen dinner rolls dough, thawed

cookingTips: Allow thawed dough rolls to come fully to room temperature before baking
Mix cornstarch with small amount of water before adding to sauce to prevent lumps
Bake rolls until golden, then pour warm coconut sauce over immediately for best absorption
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a comfort food favorite. Would you like variations on the sauce or tips for making it ahead?
